title.narrative: Strengthening capacities of human rights, equality, governance and anti-corruption public institutions in performing their key functions
Strengthening capacities of human rights, equality, governance and anti-corruption public institutions in performing their key functions

actual.value: 55 public officials (44 w. 11 m) from targeted institutions. engaged in an 8-module programme and have HR knowledge. capacities to mainstream HR in policies and legislation. knowledgeable of HRBA principles. able to address human right problem in a results-oriented manner. They are resource and valuable assets for their further professional development. 8 institutions implemented 14 HR projects. that addressed needs of different vulnerable groups and referred to a wide range of HR issues: education also for young people with special educational needs. non-discrimination and equality. protection. access to justice for mental and psycho-social disabilities. legal aid. accessible information on HR protection mechanisms. HR awareness. prevention of HR violations in prison environment and prevention of reoffending. This support has contributed to building stronger engagement in advancing the institutional HR agenda. while the results achieved enabled a change in the national HR landscape.

• The Training Programme for Moldovan civil servants in human rights had been successfully delivered and 54 representatives of Moldovan public institutions completed 8 modules of the Programme; • The programme for individual project for public institutions had been launched and the first 4 projects were in the final stages of their implementation. The 2nd round for submitting project proposals had been announced at the end of 2017.

title.narrative: State bodies and other actors effectively promote and protect human rights, gender equality and non-discrimination, with particular attention to the marginalized and the vulnerable
State bodies and other actors effectively promote and protect human rights, gender equality and non-discrimination, with particular attention to the marginalized and the vulnerable

target.value: Basic rights of individuals in Moldova are systematically monitored and addressed as a result of the enhanced capacity of national institutions to effectively fulfil their mandates and perform their functions. demonstrated through their engagement with other national and international stakeholders.

actual.value:
As a result of the finalized Training Programme on human rights and management in public institutions the awareness of human rights and human rights based approach in the activity of public institutions among the Moldovan civil servants has increased and the principles learnt are being integrated into the activity of the respective institutions through the implementation of individual projects;
The focus on human rights in the NIJ’s has significantly increased through systemic introduction of human rights standards into the training curricula and administrative practices.

title.narrative: Strengthening capacities of the National Institute of Justice
Strengthening capacities of the National Institute of Justice

actual.value: The training methodology based on revised curriculum approved by the NIJ was put in practice. HR standards are core for the new approach to the professional training. NIJ was modernized and made accessible for people with disabilities witch make its premises more accessible: access ramps and toilets. universal design of doors. stair lift platform. signage; modern and up-to-date technologies and e-tools in the admission. training and graduation process. Its facilities to provide e-Learning training courses were updated. 3 e-learning courses were completed and used as part of the training programme. NIJ was certified to provide services for training of judges and prosecutors. court clerks and chief secretaries. judicial and prosecutor’s assistants. probation officers. legal aid lawyers and others in line with 3 standards: Quality Management Systems. Educational management systems for educational organizations; Learning services for non-formal education and training for service providers.

target.value: Progress towards periodically updated training acourses taking human rights standards; joint facilities of support and/or cooperation for the institutions and upgrade of training premises to include access for people with disabilities.
